item.title: Multiple recognition threads running
item.dc:creator: MingHangDu
item.description:
Hello admin

I met the same problem as the topic which seems not solved
/forums/topic/multiple-voice-recognition-threads-running/

Here’s the sample code
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/5825996/OpenEarsSample.zip

I do voice recognition in the SecondViewController. When I go back to the ViewController(previous view controller) and push to SecondViewController again, there’re duplicated outputs. I’m sure [self.speechRecognition stopVoiceRecognition] works every time I finish voice recognition. Please help me! Thanks!

item.title: Reply To: Multiple recognition threads running
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Take a look at this thread:

/forums/topic/repeats-in-nslog/

This is due in some way to the management of the departure from the view controllers.

item.title: Reply To: Multiple recognition threads running
item.dc:creator: MingHangDu
item.description: I put self.speechRecognition.openEarsEventsObserver = nil; in - (void)viewWillDisappear:(BOOL)animated in SecondViewController. It works!! Thanks a lot!!
